body_html:
For your recent post:
Why? It should't happen if you've set the environmental variable PATH correctly. Did you skipped that part in my first link?
For your previous post:
Can you try import numpy first? And then my question is that have you installed VC2017 Redist? And finally, you can try lucasg/Dependencies on Github, use it to open _C.pyd and give me the log.

body:
For your recent post:
Why? It should't happen if you've set the environmental variable `PATH` correctly. Did you skipped that part in my first link?
For your previous post:
Can you try `import numpy` first? And then my question is that have you installed VC2017 Redist? And finally, you can try lucasg/Dependencies on Github, use it to open _C.pyd and give me the log.
